basics.name: Assistant Banking Center Manager
basics.label: Management Professional
basics.summary: Results-focused management professional offering 6 years of progressive leadership experience. Transforms high-potential staff into outstanding leaders who demonstrate the creativity and savvy that is critical to financial and operational success.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Financial reporting, Bank reconciliations, Negotiation skills, Manage Staff, and Compliance throughout Banking Center. Achieving beyond expected quota each quarter.
highlights: Developed direct mass mailings which resulted in 8% growth of customer base
Achieved status as one of the top 10 performers in the region.
Cross-sell banking services and products to clientele.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Profile management position accountable for soliciting business accounts and developing strategic alliances with clientele. Fast learner, and excellent training skills. Obtaining Loans: Personal, Home Equity, Vehicle, Commercial, and Small Business.
highlights: Develop and implement innovative marketing principles and promotional sales events for commercial and personal projects to further support financial growth
Cross-sell banking services and products to clientele
Achieving beyond expected quota each quarter

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Directed daily operations for retail banking, including branch sales, business development, customer service, and credit analysis.
highlights: Analyzed financial statements and pertinent information to determine creditworthiness of prospective customers
Counseled corporate clients and high net-worth individuals with regard to their borrowing needs
